channel.title: Allstar NPCs Attacking people sometimes
channel.description:
As you probably most all know allstar npcs are usually retards that just stand their but for some reason sometimes they attack you?
How do i make it so npc's never attack
Thank you all, i would appreciate any help

item.title: Allstar NPCs Attacking people sometimes
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

There is probably an aggression check somewhere, either in the form of a boolean or a distance check. Eliminate anything you find along those lines.

e.g. If you see something like the following, remove it,

if (npc.getPosition().distanceTo(player.getPosition() < 3 && npc.isAggressive()) { // ... }

Read full topic
